biocontainers.name: dart
biocontainers.summary: Dart: a fast and accurate RNA-seq mapper

biotools.summary: Denoising Algorithm based on Relevance network Topology is an algorithm designed to evaluate the consistency of prior information molecular signatures (e.g in-vitro perturbation expression signatures) in independent molecular data (e.g gene expression data sets). If consistent, a pruning network strategy is then used to infer the activation status of the molecular signature in individual samples.

bioschemas.name: DART
bioschemas.summary: Denoising Algorithm based on Relevance network Topology is an algorithm designed to evaluate the consistency of prior information molecular signatures (e.g in-vitro perturbation expression signatures) in independent molecular data (e.g gene expression data sets).
